name: Biscuit 610F
description:
Hello, in case you’ve forgotten, you live on planet Biscuit 610F and your name is also Biscuit. It may be embarrassing to share your name with your home planet, but you were named after your great great great great great great great … … great grandmother’s cat. That’s not exactly better but she discovered this planet all those years ago on Earth and wanted to colonise it before Earth was too far gone. 

-------------------------------------------

This visual novel game was made for the 'Man Met Game A Week' 2nd year students of 'Computer Games Technology' at Manchester Metropolitan University.

This module is about rapid prototyping, and in short it is six individual one-week-long game jams in a row.

This is week one, theme: Timers.

Game Engine Used: Twine

Game By: Kouda Ha

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Kouda_Ha

itch io: https://kouda-ha.itch.io/
